patch 8.2.1685: Vim9: cannot declare a constant value

Problem:    Vim9: cannot declare a constant value.
Solution:   Introduce ":const!".

attachments.title: patch 8.2.1685: Vim9: cannot declare a constant value · vim/vim@0b4c66c

patch 8.2.1684: "gF" does not use line number after file in Visual mode

Problem:    "gF" does not use line number after file in Visual mode.
Solution:   Look for ":123" after the Visual area. (closes #6952)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/dbeecb2b6bc5bf90b7345807e0a313fe890a7c7b|patch 8.2.1682: Vim9: const works in an unexpected way>
patch 8.2.1682: Vim9: const works in an unexpected way

Problem:    Vim9: const works in an unexpected way.
Solution:   ":const" only disallows changing the variable, not the value.
            Make "list[0] = 9" work at the script level.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1682: Vim9: const works in an unexpected way · vim/vim@dbeecb2

attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: const works in an unexpected way. Solution: &quot;:const&quot; only disallows changing the variable, not the value. Make &quot;list[0] = 9&quot; work at the script l...
